Integration.description: I practiced the basics of HTML5 & CSS3 by integrating a page for a fictional brand called 'turlututu', using only a picture.

Responsiveness.description: I tested the concept of responsiveness through the use of media queries. On this page, I made the background change color based on the size of the screen.

HTML-CSS discovery.description: I followed a set of requests to implement this web page. Through them, I learned to apply HTML Semantics and most of HTML basic tags.

Personal presentation attempt.description: Through this first coding project, I applied basic skills of HTML and CSS to create a draft of a dev landing page, with my name and social media links.
